attributes.action: To ½ the tax on beer served from the barrel sold in pubs to help cease any more closures.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To ½ the tax on beer served from the barrel sold in pubs to help cease any more closures. If the government is serious about halting the closure of the ‘local pub’, which serve communities so well then it could do it tomorrow by halving the tax on beer, sold in pubs as this is the ONE place where under-age drinking cannot occur. The tax could then be levied onto the supermarkets alcohol, which is the prime cause for under-age drinking.
